title: How do I tell Assistant to play music that's on my phone? It keeps trying to use Google Play.
content: I've told Assistant to play an album using VLC, but it tells me I need to set the default music app for Assistant. I tried following the instructions it gives, but they don't match what I see on the screen; ie: there's nothing in the top right corner, and there's no Google Assistant app, let alone Setting for Google Assistant!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
